summary: For Those Who Want To Restart Like They Finished.
descriptionHtml:
This is probably THE biggest BAT file for Skyrim I have ever done, or anyone has done. The whole file took me practically 2 hours to put together, which for a simple text file, is pretty damn long. Everything took me ages to sort-out so that you could check item Ids and what-not. I made this for those who want to restart Skyrim, the way they finished it.

When run in-game this BAT will:
- Set all skills to level 100
- Set the player to level 81
- Give the player decent stats (health, magicka, stamina, unarmed damage, carry-weight)
- Unlock all perks in every skill-set
- Teach the player every single dragon-shout that isn\'t quest related
- Give the player enough Dragon-Souls to unlock them all
- Give the player a decent amount of every single crafting item
- Give the player a decent amount of every ingredient (non-quest)
- Give the player a few decent and useful potions
- Give the player a mixture of food
- Give the the player a Lock-Pick (only one is needed thanks to unbreakable perk)
- Give the player 50000 Gold Coins
- Give the player a pickaxe and woodcutter\'s axe
- Give the player a decent amount of gems
- Give the player a decent amount of Soul-Gems
- Give the player a full Ancient-Nord Armour set
- Give the player a full Nord-Hero Weapons set
- Give the player a decent amount of arrows

If you want me to add anything else, then let me know. Any endorsement would be much appreciated, thanks.
author: Els236
